response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it will be worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a significant advantage over your competitors while ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
